title: `additionalItems` ignored when `items` is an object
description: Up to draft-2019-09, `additionalItems` is ignored unless `items` is an array. (The keyword was removed in draft-2020-12.)

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: additionalItems with schema-based items
comprehensiveExamples.description: When `items` is a schema, `additionalItems` is ignored and should not be used.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: additionalItems with tuple validation
comprehensiveExamples.description: `additionalItems` is valid only when `items` is an array (tuple).

message: Remove `additionalItems` or convert `items` into an array.
